review_text: It is one of the best app for beginners, I use this app from 2022. I love the interface, because very clean and neat. I never faced any glitches.

the most liked moment using this app is to place delivery orders.. just one click.... all done... but some wished features.... font size should be a little high. there should be an option to select amount or number of shares for buy orders

I have had a very good experience using the Groww investment app. The app is very simple, user-friendly and easy to understand, even for beginners. Investing in mutual funds and stocks is smooth and hassle-free. The portfolio tracking, SIP management and notifications are very helpful. Overall, Groww makes investing easy, safe and convenient. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to start investing.

"I really enjoy using the Groww app for its clean interface, but it is missing a crucial feature for active traders. But manually changing the Stop Loss and Target figures repeatedly is extremely irritating and time-consuming. In a fast-moving market, typing numbers manually creates panic. Please introduce On the Chart ,so we can simply "TRAILING SL" visually. This manual process is a huge hassle for traders."
Best app for all kinds of investments. In brief, you can do SIP's in mutual funds, can see your portfolio, can have all sort of things that an investment app should have. Best One !

1. best app for invests in Share market 2. Pledge amount is usable at the 100% ratio like all other apps 3. Brokerage is less or avg like all other platforms available in market 4. Daily updates over mail and msg are good 5. overall app is good but there are still gaps in app to fix and enhance it.
Bug report: Exit button not working sometimes in Scalper mode

Very unhappy with customer support team from last one week I had contact them but they are not able to give me the right information they not receiving call they don't care of customer problem once you read it grow please call me back again today sbfc is 6 percent upper side still showing 3 percent on grow also last query not solve they just don't care about you they just rob your money by this glitch

bakwaas app. zero ⭐ to this app. Paisa deposit toh jldi ho jata hai. par apna Paisa withdrawal Krna ho toh ek din. shame on this kind of app. maha bekar app withdrawal Krna ho toh 2-3 din aur deposit sath ke sath. poor app. instant withdrawal kya bakwaas hai. ghatiya app sirf fees charge krte hai help koi nahi krte. instant withdrawal option shutdown kar do.

one of the most useless app for Futures traders. everyday ur buying price will be adjusted will last day closing price. your PnL will start from zero next day. you wilo have to remember past days profit or keep an excel ir your positions increase. i will be shifting from Groww at the end of this month as this is not feasible and impacts the decision making process. i know there is MTM settlement everyday but what is the harm in showing your profit or loss like you do in options.
Everything looked good, money can be withdrawn easily, there is no problem in withdrawing it, it gets credited to the account quickly and it is very easy to see and learn it.

the app is very simple and user friendly, the UI/UX is beautiful,especially the colour combination and themes used in the app. Also they provide in detail information about the assets in which the person wishes to invest.

I am new investor and this app has made it easy for me to begin my investment journey. I was first doing it playfully until I got my basic understanding right then began serious investments on small scale. highly recommend for all kind of investors.

*Useless Costumer Support* Since morning 7:00 am I'm struggling with Costumer support email, Chats and phone call, but there's no response from there side. They ask for 5 star for this useless and irresponsible service. Very disappointing 😞 Few days back, I executed a trade in GOLD COMMODITIES. I was in profit of 10,000 rs. then I placed exit order but not done, even I struggled for 5 minutes then this got exited with a loss of 4,000 rs. This is the difference of discount broker & Full time.
In the New Updated version I can't use the tool to judge the movements like RSI and more . Please change the settings

Order did not trigger. I had placed a GTT order to be triggered when the share price came down to 222 per share, but it did not get trigged even when the price had reached 220. This is really disappointing

Been with Groww for 7+ years now. Not seen a platform which is so intuitive and where transparency is given such importance and where users experience is equally thought about along with process. Great support team too. Stay the same Groww.. Let's Groww together. Thank you

Groww is a reliable and trustworthy platform for anyone who wants to learn about the share market and start investing confidently. Based on my four years of usage, I would highly recommend Groww to new investors and traders who are looking for an easy, educational, and dependable investment app.

Worst broker. On 15 Jan 2026, I tried to place a CE sell order for silver at the spot price of 290000 around 6.20 pm. My order was rejected claiming the strike was too far, even though my sell price was the closest among all bids. This indicates manipulation by prioritizing other orders. I have screenshots of the error and will file a complaint with SEBI. They have Illiterate Customer executive

Third class customer service and backend operations dept. Worst nightmare getting simple issues resolved. It seems Groww is least bothered and not capable of handling customer service. Don't burn your fingers dealing with this broker.

Groww has proven to be an exceptional trading platform, offering consistently smooth performance across all segments. Its clean, intuitive interface is particularly valuable for fast-paced activities like option trading and scalping. The platform's ability to maintain a simple user experience while delivering powerful features makes it a reliable tool for traders. Everything feels snappy and the indicators are super easy to apply. And overall experience gas been great 👍 👌
